share on x tb teresa lynn barker. jun 21 at 3:58 pm lit a candle in memory of raymond lloyd smith. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x tb teresa lynn barker. jun 21 at 3:58 pm rodney, besty, sara, samuel, rebekah, micheal, sydney, seth, simon and hunter. we are so sorry to hear about your dad and grandfather. may god wrap his loving arms around you all during the next few days and give you comfort. we love each and everyone of you and will be praying for all. if you need anything remember we are just a call away. love&prayers, teresa & bruce barker. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... graveside service. jun 23. church hill memory gardens. church hill, tn, usget order flowers now for raymond 's graveside service receiving of friends. jun 23. 11:00 am - 1:00 pm carter-trent funeral home-kingsport520 watauga street. kingsport, tn, us, 37660. get order flowers now for raymond 's receiving of friends service. jun 23. 1:00 pm carter-trent funeral home-kingsport520 watauga street. kingsport, tn, us, 37660. get order flowers now for raymond 's service wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe facebook google+ carter-trent funeral homes kingsport - church hill - scott co., va website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
